doc.field: 2 gelatin silver prints, mounted, 3 1/4 x 4 3/4 in. of New York City urban youth. One shows the back window of a school bus with a bullet hole; the other is of a young girl in a sundress jumping rope down an urban sidewalk. Signed, dated and stamped by the photographer.
